definitions.text: a cgs unit of dynamic viscosity equal to one dyne-second per square centimeter; the viscosity of a fluid in which a force of one dyne per square centimeter maintains a velocity of 1 centimeter per second
a state of being balanced in a stable equilibrium
great coolness and composure under strain

examples: The bird poised for a few moments before it attacked

definitions.text: prepare (oneself) for something unpleasant or difficult
cause to be balanced or suspended
